In childhood I was beautiful, cute and fragile
In childhood I mostly played alone and secretly and had imaginary friends
In adolescence in most matters I was under my mother's command and usually checked most things with my mother
Work assigned to me, I usually deliver at the last moment
I really don't know why I chose this field of study and entered university and didn't use my field of study much
In work or study I jumped from branch to branch a lot and have many unfinished works
I'm interested in areas of astrology, psychoanalysis, metaphysics, spirituality, fortune-telling, tarot, mystery
Usually it's people around me who decide for me, and it doesn't matter to me what I choose, and in a gathering I'm usually following the group's opinions and give less opinion myself
Many times when making decisions I become hesitant and don't know what choice is suitable for me, and hesitation is the most important subject of my life
Flexibility and compromise are my prominent characteristics
I really don't know what my goal in life is and what I want
It often happens that I feel tired, bored and listless and I don't know why I'm so listless
I love shopping and I'm only happy during shopping time, and before or after I feel upset again and feel bad
I have a very strong sixth sense and many times, before something happens, I know what's coming
Whatever I want is provided for me, and if I don't have something, the only reason is I didn't have the patience to want it
I have the ability to cry for a long time and others are very surprised by this and don't understand me
I evoke this feeling in people that 'I need help and support me, I'm weak.'
I trust people very quickly
I daydream and fantasize a lot, and also sleep a lot and have deep dreams
In relationship with men, usually I'm chosen by them and I'm not the chooser
For marrying I always hesitate about who to marry and prefer someone to decide for me and finish the work
I'm very waiting for someone to come and solve problems and make me happy
Making commitments is hard for me and it often happens that after promising I regret
I usually don't interfere in my children's matters and consider myself incapable, and maybe even my children boss me around, and I even prefer my mother to manage my relationship with my children
Others tell me I'm much younger than my age, and aging, wrinkles, losing freshness is very upsetting for me and I'm willing to fix them with plastic surgery
